original_text: And he went up, and lay upon the child, and put his mouth upon his mouth, and his eyes upon his eyes, and his hands upon his hands: and stretched himself upon the child; and the flesh of the child waxed warm.
korean_text: 아이 위에 올라 엎드려 자기 입을 그의 입에, 자기 눈을 그의 눈에, 자기 손을 그의 손에 대고 그의 몸에 엎드리니 아이의 살이 차차 따뜻하더라

sentences.original_text: and put his mouth upon his mouth
and his eyes upon his eyes
and his hands upon his hands
and stretched himself upon the child
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아이 위로 몸을 펴서 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: and the flesh of the child waxed warm
